LanguageData.MilleniumLineFurniture.label: 千禧线家具(Millenium Line Furniture)
LanguageData.MilleniumLineFurniture.description: 你的一个殖民者发现了一个旧的数据贴满古E-杂志的。 其中挽救数据是RIMkea杂志问题＃4120。它引入了 在“未来主义” RIMkea千禧线，现在你可以建造它呢！(One of your colonists found an old data-stick full of ancient E-Magazines. Among the salvageable data is a RIMkea Magazine, issue #4120. It introduced the "futuristic" RIMkea Millenium Line, and now you can build it too!)
LanguageData.RustikaFurniture.label: Rustika家具(Rustika Furniture)
LanguageData.RustikaFurniture.description: 你的一个殖民者发现了一个旧的数据贴满古E-杂志的。 其中挽救数据是RIMkea杂志问题＃3522。这个问题是一个特别版 从asorted Rimworlds描绘各种“部落”家具的款式。(One of your colonists found an old data-stick full of ancient E-Magazines. Among the salvageable data is a RIMkea Magazine, issue #3522. This issue was a special edition portraying various "tribal" furniture styles from asorted Rimworlds.)
